entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Mingan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:15 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow ending late this evening then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
